core.name: Star Kinght's Journey
core.description: (Test V1) Team Physical DMG +30%, Team weapon skill Crit Rate +35%

subskills.name: Star Kinght's Journey
subskills.description: (Test V1) Team Physical DMG +30%, Team weapon skill Crit Rate +35%

core.name: Glory of Schariac
core.description:
(Test V1)
The black armor turns into Juan
Knight Form ATK Sequence (Physical DMG): 150%+200% > 3x120% > 400% > 500%

While galloping, press dodge button to [Stomp], hold ATK button to [Charge] and release atk button during [Charge] to deal [Elite Strike]
Stomp: Deal 350% ATK Physical DMG, pull nearby enemies, and can hold ATK button to connect to [Charge]
Charge: Deal Nx110% ATK Physical DMG (N = no of hits, max 20), hitting enemy consumes meter.
Elite Strike: Deal 800% ATK Physical DMG
[Stomp] [Charge] [Elite Strike] are all Charged ATK

subskills.name: Valkyrie's Path
subskills.description: (Test V1) Stomp and Charge have Adamance effect (immunity while attacking)

subskills.name: Valkyrie's Legacy
subskills.description: (Test V1) After 10 hits of Charge, improve damage: [Charge] [Elite Strike] Total DMG +60%, Crit Rate +100%, Crit DMG +60%

subskills.name: Valkyrie's Glory
subskills.description: (Test V1) Charge deal additional 30% ATK Physical DMG

core.name: Riding Aria
core.description:
(Test V1)
Guardian Form: Weapon skill restore 1 meter, evasion skill or retaliation restore 2 meter, max 6 meter.
Knight Form: While moving, meter gradually charges up. When meter is full, Krishna starts to gallop. When Durandal stops moving, meter starts reducing down. (Basic ATK, Ultimate, getting hit, etc)

subskills.name: Genius
subskills.description: (Test V1) When switching forms, reset the CD of evasion skill. CD: 12s

subskills.name: Seed of Sumeru
subskills.description: (Test V1) Weapon skill Physical DMG +30%, Crit DMG +30%

subskills.name: Holy Sword's Blessing
subskills.description: (Test V1) Enemies receive 25% more Physical DMG from PE (independent bonus)

core.name: Palatinus March
core.description:
(Test V1)
Tap Ult to switch forms. Switching from Knight to Guardian form activates Shield Burst; Switching from Guardian to Knight form triggers evasion skill.

Hold Ult buton to ult [100 sp, 20s CD]
Dual form stigmata power merges as one, spiralling lance to unleash a devastating attack. Deal 2000% ATK Physical DMG in a large area. Pauses timer.

subskills.name: Herrscher Slayer
subskills.description: (Test V1) When ult hits IMG enemies, deal dmg to IMG core too, at 100% rate (direct hp loss effect)

subskills.name: Echo of Flames
subskills.description: (Test V1) Ult Total DMG +50%, Ult is guaranteed to crit.

core.name: Antinomian Duality
core.description:
(Test V1)
Guardian Form: Hold down evasion to [Defense], press forward+evasion to [Shield Burst]
[Defense] When attacked during this period, nullify enemy attack and counter with 120% ATK Physical DMG, and can trigger evasion skill.
[Shield Burst] Can trigger the same effect by bashing the enemy, can also trigger evasion skill.
Evasion skill: Trigger 2s Time Fracture and can connect to Rising Slash weapon skill. CD: 10s

Knight Form: Non-ultimate evasion triggers evasion skill. Trigger 2s Time Fracture, fill meter, CD: 10s. (Cant trigger evasion skill while Krishna is galloping) When triggering evasion skill, press directional button to enter galloping state, tap evasion key to [Stomp] and long press ATK button to [Charge], CD: 10s.

subskills.name: QTE - Symmetry Breaking
subskills.description: (Test V1) QTE: Triggered by time slow or enemy knocked up. Enter as Knight form, trigger 2s Time Fracture, deal 1000% ATK Physical DMG and with full meter.

core.name: Immortal Kaslana
core.description:
(Test V1)
Guardian Form ATK Sequence (Physical DMG): 150%+200% > 220% > 8x80% briefly pulls enemies > 300%
When meter is full, hold ATK button to trigger a powerful Palatinus Slash, trigger 2s Time Fracture, deal 200% + 750% ATK Physical DMG
Shield Burst: Deal 150% ATK Physical DMG
Rising Slash: Deal 800% ATK Physical DMG

subskills.name: Shield of the People
subskills.description: (Test V1) Restore 12 sp on successful retaliation (block/bash with evasion skill)

subskills.name: Chimera's Legacy
subskills.description: (Test V1) When Knight form switch to Guardian form, if evasion skill is triggered, restore 3 meter.
